metadata.title: CVE-2024-39465 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:media: mgb4: Fix double debugfs removeFixes an error where debugfs_remove_recursive() is called first on a parentdirectory and then again on a child which causes a kernel panic.[hverkuil: added Fixes/Cc tags]

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
